memberdef.name: ALIAS_FUNCTION
memberdef.initializer: template <typename... TArgs>\ inline auto aliasedFunctionName( TArgs&&... args ) -> decltype( originalFunctionName( std::forward<TArgs>( args )... ) )\ {\ return originalFunctionName( std::forward<TArgs>( args )... );\ }

briefdescription.para: optimal way of renaming/aliasing a function to another - can be inline & no unnecessary copies

memberdef.name: CLASS_NAMER
memberdef.initializer: private:\ static inline constexpr const char *s_className = #className ;\ public:\ static constexpr const char* getClassName() noexcept\ {\ return s_className;\ }\ private:
